htmlBody: Can‘t recommend the program enough. I was part of the first cohort and not only learned theoretically about the ins and outs of AI governance but also saw how it works in practice during the time in Brussels. TrainingForGood put so much effort into making this the most rewarding, beneficial, and effective use of our time possible and always went the extra mile to support us individually on our early career journeys in AI governance! It’s a great chance to test the water in the field, you really can’t go wrong here :)
